string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "Nicki loves Judge Judy and she even calls her a \"comedian\"."
"Nicki would also enjoy playing a role in an action movie, like Angelina Jolie."
"Nicki's dream role is to play someone in a Tim Burton movie, where she would get dressed up and painted and crazy."
"Nicki thinks that Lady GaGa is \"badass\" and she would not mind doing a song with GaGa."
"Nicki claims that she would do a song with Taylor Swift."
"The outfit that Nicki wore to The Grammy's was by Givenchy."
"Nicki's real name is Onika Maraj."
"Her birthday is December 8, 1984."
"The tattoo on her left arm is Chinese script for \"God is with me always\"."
"Minaj is of mixed descent with African, Trinidadian and Indo-Asian roots."
"She's a Saggitarius."
"She's a native New Yorker hailing from Jamaica, Queens, NY."
"Nicki Minaj's fast food of choice is Popeyes Chicken."
"She has a sister and two brothers."
"She worked at a Red Lobster restaurant in the Bronx."
"Nicki Minaj has also referred to herself as \"Cookie\",\"Harajuku Barbie\" and \"Roman Zolanski\"."
"Nicki is the survivor of a broken home. The product of a drug addicted father and a struggling single-mom."
"She studied singing and acting at LaGaurdia High School in NY where she graduated."
"Before rapping she sang background vocals and hooks for local rap acts from around her way."
"In 2008 she won the Female Artist Of The Year at the Underground Music Awards."
"She is the first female rap act signed to rapper Lil Wayne's Young Money Records and is the labels first lady."
"Nicki sites beloved rap figure Lauryn Hill as one of her major influences and says that she wants fans to focus on her music and not her sexy image."
"Minaj is openly bi-sexual."
"Nicki is shittin' on all the other rap bitches."
"Nicki remembers listening to George Michael as she grew up."
"Nicki wears Chloe perfume."
"Nicki's mom once had a dream that her dad would set the house on fire. The next day, her dad actually set the house on fire."
"Nicki has been writing and recording raps for over 7 years."
"Nicki's mom means the world to her."
"Nicki's father dealt with alcohol and drugs as Nicki grew up."
"Nicki started making \"weird raps\" when she was 11 years old."
"Nicki loves her barbs and kens."
"Pink Friday is PLATINUM."
"Nicki was fired from about 4 red lobsters because they said she \"had attitude\".
"Nicki used to be a waitress."
"Nicki plans on making a perfume."
"Nicki loves intelligent men."
"Nicki says she loves white boys."
"Nicki doesn't get drunk."
"Nicki doesn't like saying \"men\" or \"women\". She likes to say \"boys\" and \"girls\"."
"Nicki says that she is a perfectionist."
"Nicki was asked if she was a dancer and she replied \"hell to the no\"."
"In high school, Nicki put a b in front of people's names."
"Nicki says that in her next album she might do some Trini accent."
"Nicki says that her song \"Save Me\" is a more \"Onika\" type of song."
"Nicki loves tattoos."
"Nicki says that Wayne is little but he has a nice body."
"Nicki's first kiss was in elementary school with a boy named Derrick or a boy named Travis. She can't quite remember."
"Nicki claims that she had the most fun recording \"Roman's Revenge\" out of all songs on Pink Friday."
"Nicki started rapping by just being funny and messing around and eventually joined a small rap group."
"Nicki thinks a good wifey is naughty or nice. She says \"Too nice is not good\"."
"Nicki says that \"Queen's girls are more girly than most girls\"."
"Nicki eats rap bitches for dinner."
"Nicki Minaj became the first artist ever to have seven songs within the Billboard Hot 100 at the same time."
"Some of Nicki's favorite comedians include: Martin Lawrence, Chris Rock and Larry David."
"Nicki's favorite party anthem is Firework by Katy Perry."
"Nicki's favorite love song is Just the Way You Are by Bruno Mars."
"Nicki's favorite video shoot was \"Check it Out\" with will.i.am."
"Nicki used to play the clarinet."
"Nicki likes Kit-Kats."
"Nicki's appearance on SNL gave the show their second highest ratings in the season."
"Nicki Minaj is a morning person."
"Nicki's favorite color is pink."
"Nicki Minaj dislikes people that burp."
"Nicki hates cats."
"Nicki graduated from LaGuardia High School (Manhattan). There, she studied singing and acting."
"Her favorite actress is Jada Pinkett."
"Nicki's favorite movies are Gladiator and Set it Off"
"Nicki loves to write."
"Nicki Currently Lives in Atlanta, Georgia"
"She likes to Shop in Costume Stores"
"Niki is Afraid of heights."
